items.title: The real ping pong champion — and hustler — who inspired 'Marty Supreme'
items.description: Marty Reisman was nicknamed "The Needle" for his slender physique. He dressed well and put on a show.

items.title: California Gets Heavy Rain, Snarled Travel and Power Outages for Christmas
items.description: Officials warned that driving for holiday celebrations would be hazardous across much of the state, with heavy rain still to fall in some places.

items.title: Five Killed in Helicopter Crash on Kilimanjaro, Africa’s Highest Peak
items.description: The aircraft was on its descent from the mountain when it crashed around the Barafu Camp area in Kilimanjaro National Park, officials said.
